entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 6:44 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: SE 37 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except locally 10 mm south of Hare Bay. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
